column33: How did you hear about us?
column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: I was crossing the street at the crosswalk and none of the vehicles on either side of the street would stop for me.

Drivers speed through the crosswalk without stopping for pedestrians. My children and I have nearly been hit at least 4 times in this crosswalk. We desperately need speed bumps on Morning View to slow down the drivers. This is a walking neighborhood and children walk to school and back daily. Crossing in the crosswalk is very dangerous.
column21: We need speed bumps in this community
